concept.label: first-question
concept.phrase: Why did you do "%i%" here?
Why did you perform "%i%" here?
Why do you think I need to perform "%i%" next?
Please explain why did you apply "%i%" here?
What made you choose "%i%" as the correct step?
Among subtract/add/divide/multiply, why did you choose "%i_opr%" here?
How did you know we should %i_opr% with "%i_op%"?

concept.label: R2Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Fantastic! Thanks!
That's a helpful response. Thanks!
Perfect! You are one of the best teachers I have had so far!
You're a fantastic teacher!
Makes perfect sense to me. Thank you!
Genius! That helped a lot!
Sweet! Explanation right on the spot!
Thanks for explaining using the key terms. That’s very helpful!
What a smart teacher I have! Thanks for explaining it so clearly!
You are tremendously good at explaining things to me!
Thanks for caring about my learning. Your explanations are quite helpful!

concept.label: R2N-response-simst
concept.phrase: I understand what you said, but for this equation only. Using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab, can you explain when "%i%" is the best way to go in general?
I understand what you said, but for this equation only. Can you explain when %i% work, in general, using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?
I understand what you said, but for this equation only. Can you explain what features in general make "%i_opr%" the best way to go using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?
What you said looks very specific to the current equation only. I was wondering if you could explain when "%i_opr%" is the best way to go in general using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab?
I understand what you meant, but for this equation only. Can you explain why "%i%" works, in general, using the key terms in the Unit Overview tab?

concept.label: R1Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: Thanks for describing it so thoughtfully!
Thanks for the witty response!
Thanks for explaining it to me so wisely!
Your explanation was right on the spot!

concept.label: R1N-response-simst
concept.phrase: Please explain what went wrong using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.
How did you figure out that something went wrong? Please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.
Please explain what went wrong using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab.
Please describe what went wrong using the key terms from the Unit Overview tab.

concept.label: R0Y-response-simst
concept.phrase: I see you mentioned about a key term. However, it is not informative enough for me. Please add a little more information with that to teach me what motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"?
I see you mentioned about a key term. However, it is not informative enough for me. Please add a little more information to teach me why you performed "%i%" here?
I see you mentioned about a key term. However, it is not informative enough for me. Please elaborate more on why "%i%" is correct?

concept.label: R0Y-response-simst-2
concept.phrase: Your explanation is still very brief. Please add more information on how did you know "%i%" is the correct step to apply?
Your explanation is still too short for me to understand properly. Please add more information on why you performed "%i%" here?

concept.label: R0N-response-simst
concept.phrase: I am trying to understand what makes "%i%" correct in depth. Would you please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?
Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain why you chose "%i_opr%" among subtract/add/divide/multiply?
I attempt to learn things deeply to solve any equation. Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain why "%i%" is correct?
I want to strengthen my basic understanding. What motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"? Please explain using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab.
Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain what motivated you to demonstrate "%i%"?
Using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab, explain why you performed "%i%" here?

concept.label: R0N-response-simst-2
concept.phrase: Can you explain why "%i%" is your first guess using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?
Today is my day to learn from you. Can you explain why "%i%" is your first guess using the key terms mentioned in the Unit Overview tab?

concept.label: move-on
concept.phrase: Tough luck, but let’s move on for now!
Hmm...I will get back to it again later. Let’s move on for now!
Umm...I am not very sure what you meant. I will get back to it again later. Let’s move on now!
Although I am not convinced yet, let’s move on for now!
Hmm..I am still confused; I will get back to it later. Let’s move on for now!
Umm..I did not quite get what you said but let me move on for now! I will get back to it later again.

concept.label: rephrase
concept.phrase: I did not get that. Please try again to explain why "%i%" is the correct step here.
That was hard to understand. Can you explain again why you applied "%i%" here?
I'm afraid I don't follow you. Let's try one more time. Among subtract/add/divide/multiply, why did you choose "%i_opr%" here?
Sorry, I didn't catch that. Let's try one more time. How did you know we should %i_opr% with "%i_op%"?
That went way over my head. Can you explain again why you applied "%i%" here?

concept.label: unanticipated-response
concept.phrase: anything else
